allow: Bash(mkdir -p "D:/PromiPoints/WeApi" && cd "D:/PromiPoints/WeApi" && dotnet new sln -n PromiPoints --force 2>&1)

Bash(cd "D:/PromiPoints/WeApi" && dotnet new webapi -n WebApi --no-openapi false --framework net8.0 --force 2>&1 && dotnet new classlib -n Services --framework net8.0 --force 2>&1 && dotnet new classlib -n Business --framework net8.0 --force 2>&1 && dotnet new classlib -n DataAccess --framework net8.0 --force 2>&1 && dotnet new classlib -n Shared --framework net8.0 --force 2>&1)
Bash(cd "D:/PromiPoints/WeApi" && dotnet sln add WebApi/WebApi.csproj Services/Services.csproj Business/Business.csproj DataAccess/DataAccess.csproj Shared/Shared.csproj 2>&1)

Bash(cd "D:/PromiPoints/WeApi" && dotnet add WebApi/WebApi.csproj reference Services/Services.csproj Shared/Shared.csproj DataAccess/DataAccess.csproj 2>&1 && dotnet add Services/Services.csproj reference Business/Business.csproj Shared/Shared.csproj DataAccess/DataAccess.csproj 2>&1 && dotnet add DataAccess/DataAccess.csproj reference Business/Business.csproj 2>&1 && dotnet add Business/Business.csproj reference Shared/Shared.csproj 2>&1)

Bash(cd "D:/PromiPoints/WeApi" && dotnet add WebApi/WebApi.csproj package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer --version 8.0.* 2>&1 && dotnet add WebApi/WebApi.csproj package Swashbuckle.AspNetCore --version 6.* 2>&1 && dotnet add WebApi/WebApi.csproj package Serilog.AspNetCore --version 8.* 2>&1 && dotnet add WebApi/WebApi.csproj package Serilog.Sinks.Console 2>&1 && dotnet add WebApi/WebApi.csproj package Serilog.Sinks.File 2>&1 && dotnet add WebApi/WebApi.csproj package BCrypt.Net-Next --version 4.* 2>&1 && dotnet add WebApi/WebApi.csproj package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design --version 8.* 2>&1)
Bash(cd "D:/PromiPoints/WeApi" && dotnet tool list -g | grep dotnet-ef || dotnet tool install --global dotnet-ef 2>&1)
Bash(cd "D:/PromiPoints/WeApi" && dotnet ef migrations add InitialCreate --project DataAccess --startup-project WebApi 2>&1)
Bash(cd "D:/PromiPoints/WeApi" && dotnet ef database update --project DataAccess --startup-project WebApi 2>&1)
Bash(cd "D:/PromiPoints/WeApi/GenHash" && dotnet new console --force -n GenHash 2>&1 | tail -3 && dotnet add GenHash.csproj package BCrypt.Net-Next --version 4.* 2>&1 | tail -3 && dotnet run 2>&1)

Bash(cd "D:/PromiPoints/WeApi" && dotnet ef migrations remove --project DataAccess --startup-project WebApi --force 2>&1 && dotnet ef migrations add InitialCreate --project DataAccess --startup-project WebApi 2>&1)
